(Öğrenme limitinde): Agility: Each point gives five weapon points and increases weapon speed by 0.5%. The following skills can not be developed beyond 1/3 of Agility: weapon-master, Shield, Athletics, Riding, Mounted archery, Looting.

In The Last Days, you need Resource Points to obtain equipment. Resource Points are a measure of how willing a faction is to keep you supplied, and of how much of the faction resources you are entitled to use.
